hymn.title: What, know ye not that your body
hymn.chords: | C - - - | Dm - G - | Dm7 - G7 - | C - F/C - | C - - - | Dm - G - | Dm7 - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - G7/F - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C - C7/E - | F - G7/F - | Em - Am - | Dm - G7 - | C F/C C - |

layout.singingstanza: What, know ye not that your bod -- y Is a ves -- sel for the Lord? What, know ye not that your bod -- y Is a ves -- sel for the Lord? And we are not our own, We have been formed for our Mak -- er. We are not our own, We be -- long to God.

lyrics.stanza: What, know ye not that your body Is a vessel for the Lord? What, know ye not that your body Is a vessel for the Lord? And we are not our own, We have been formed for our Maker. We are not our own, We belong to God.
